rules_text:
Whenever Shattered Sword Assassin blocks or becomes blocked, it deals damage to blocked or blocking creature equal to its power.
Blight {3}{B}{B} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {3}{B}{B}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever a creature you control blocks or becomes blocked, the creature blocked or blocking it deals damage equal to its power to the creature you control.
